section.name: VODesktop and Astro Runtime
section.p: This is the project documentation for VODesktop and Astro Runtime. It contains information on how to develop, compile, package, configure and deploy the software. It also describes some of the behaviour and requirements of the application.
Note that this is not the user documentation. Although advanced users and scripters may find things of use here, the average user should look at the User Documentation.

section.name: Releases
section.p: Public releases can be found at http://www.astrogrid.org/wiki/Install/Downloads
Development snapshots can be found at http://wiki.astrogrid.org/bin/view/Astrogrid/DesktopAstroGridSnapshots
